meanings.definition: Phrases or sayings commonly used by mothers to impart wisdom or advice to their children.
meanings.sent1: My mom shared some of her favorite momisms with me when I was feeling down.
meanings.sent2: I always smile when I hear my friend's momisms; they are so comforting.
meanings.sent3: My mom's momisms always seem to make everything better, even on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: The momisms from generations past continue to guide us like beacons in the night.
meanings.sent5: The power of momisms lies in their ability to resonate with us long after they are spoken.

meanings.definition: The act of using maternal wisdom or advice in everyday situations.
meanings.sent1: Her constant momisms about kindness have shaped my outlook on life.
meanings.sent2: I find myself relying on momisms more and more as I navigate adulthood.
meanings.sent3: Sometimes I catch myself using momisms without even realizing it; it's like second nature.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of chaos, momisms serve as our guiding stars, leading us to calmer waters.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of momisms is what makes them so powerful in our daily lives.
